pullRequest.title: Update SCM API and related SPAs
pullRequest.bodyText:
Issue: #8546
Description: Since GoCD 19.2.0, the pluggable scm configuration can be defined in config repo. Hence,

added origin information in the SCM API (upgraded to v4)
disabled edit/clone/delete operation on Pluggable SCMs SPA when defined in config repo
Also disabled edit operation on materials spa for same.

beforeCommit.message:
Update materials spa
 - add origin info to internal materials api for plugin materials
 - disable edit option for plugin material when defined in config repo

afterCommit.message:
Update materials spa
 - add origin info to internal materials api for plugin materials
 - disable edit option for plugin material when defined in config repo

beforeCommit.message:
Update materials spa
 - add origin info to internal materials api for plugin materials
 - disable edit option for plugin material when defined in config repo

afterCommit.message:
Update materials spa

 - disable edit option for plugin material when defined in config repo

nodes.bodyText: I don't think we should be sharing representers between API versions. It's ok for each version to have it's own set of shared representers.

beforeCommit.message:
Update materials spa
 - add origin info to internal materials api for plugin materials
 - disable edit option for plugin material when defined in config repo

afterCommit.message:
Update materials spa
 - add origin info to internal materials api for plugin materials
 - disable edit option for plugin material when defined in config repo

nodes.bodyText: How are we handling updates to SCM's from ConfigRepo?
Same as above, how is delete to SCM's from ConfigRepo handled?

commit.message:
Upgrade SCM API to v4
 - add origin information

Update Pluggable SCM SPA

 - disable edit/clone/delete operations if scm is defined in config repo
 - add a flash message when edit is tried via mithril routing

Update materials spa
 - add origin info to internal materials api for plugin materials
 - disable edit option for plugin material when defined in config repo
Send 422 for update/delete of an scm when defined remotely

beforeCommit.message:
Update materials spa
 - add origin info to internal materials api for plugin materials
 - disable edit option for plugin material when defined in config repo

afterCommit.message: Send 422 for update/delete of an scm when defined remotely
